author: ehillenius
msg: - added method to support calling configure with a path
- removed the split option. This was a very dangerous idea, as it used the OS dependend seperator which could thus result in problems when deploying on another platform
- any given path was only used for development -> inconsistent API.

msg: just poll the classpath for changes
